titleStmt.title: The preachers charge, and peoples duty about preaching and hearing of the Word : opened in a sermon, being the first fruits of a publike exercise, begun in the parish church of Lownd, for the benefit of the island of Louingland in Suffolke / by Iohn Brinsley ...
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bird, and are to be sold by Thomas Carre in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
